import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import {FontAwesomeIcon} from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import {faCalendar, faCirclePlus,faMagnifyingGlass} from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import {useEffect, useState} from "react"; function HomePage() { const [data1, setData] = useState([]) const [show,setHide]=useState('false') const [selectedValues, setSelectedValues] = useState([]); const [checkedValues, setCheckedValues] = useState([]); const [uniqueCheckedValues, setUniqueCheckedValues] = useState([]); const [count,setCount]=useState([0]) const handleCheckboxChange = (e) => { const value = e.target.value; const isChecked = e.target.checked; setCheckedValues(prev => { let updatedValues; if (isChecked) { updatedValues = [...prev, value]; } else { updatedValues = prev.filter((item) => item !== value); } const filteredData = data1.filter((item) => updatedValues.includes(item.location)); setData(filteredData); // Set the updatedValues state return updatedValues; }); }; const showHide=()=>{ setHide(!show) } const fetchData= async () =>{ try{ const response= await fetch('http://localhost:8000/data1') const json= await response.json() console.log("data1",data1) setData(json) }catch (err) { console.log(err) } } const handleFilterValue = (value) => { console.log('Filter value:', value); }; useEffect(()=>{ fetchData() },[]) return ( <>

) } export default HomePage
